about_the_game: Demo for Ambient Dark; a music experience for relaxing, working or studying late at night, or falling asleep. Find a place to sit down and get comfortable in our futuristic virtual spaceport lounge. Listen to soothing ambient soundtracks and watch the spaceships silently glide past the window.
detailed_description: Demo for Ambient Dark; a music experience for relaxing, working or studying late at night, or falling asleep. Find a place to sit down and get comfortable in our futuristic virtual spaceport lounge. Listen to soothing ambient soundtracks and watch the spaceships silently glide past the window.
name: Ambient Dark Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3230M @ 2.60GHz or equivalent AMD processor and above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8GB nVidia GeForce GTX1070 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 CPU @ 3.60GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8GB nVidia GeForce GTX1070
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Audio

short_description: Your departure has been delayed. Please enjoy our free complimentary lounge to relax, work, study or sleep.
